name: Michael does funkin (DEMO)
description:
This mod is where you fight a kid named Michael. He will set a lot of song against you even harder ones so he careful.

REMEMBER: THIS MOD IS BASED ON A BALDI'S BASICS MOD! THIS MOD IS IN DEMO RIGHT NOW SO EXSPECT SOME BUGS AND UNFINISHED STUFF!

I do need a little bit of help with this mod. if anyone is interested contact me on discord here: Michael does Gaming#1080

Artists:

SM Principal for most of the art

Kayip for the Michael drawing.

Music composers:

mimikyu949

Joojador Ruim

Inspiration:

Cynda the algebra inspiration.
